Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: Itzhak Pearlman - agreed by many experts to be “the world's best violinist" - on 29 March 1994 gave a special performance at the Children's Medical Centre of Israel in Petahl Tikva, at the behest of hospital founder, New Yorker lrving Schneider.
